author: brane
msg: * STATUS:
Propose r18254 and note dependency between these two proposals.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Perform the REPORT request for update, but do not parse the correctly
returned response yet.
This code is reaching the point where there are obvious opportunities to
refactor, optimize, and move code around, but we're not ready to do that until
we can sucessfully drive a checkout.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/serf.c
(svn_ra_serf__open): Use a subpool so that the pool lifetimes are correct
(report_context_t): new structure to store report information
(add_tag_buckets): helper function to add XML taggy buckets
(start_report, end_report, cdata_report): abort() stubs
(handle_report): implement handler for REPORT request
(set_path): implement by adding buckets for this path
(delete_path, link_path, abort_report): abort() stubs
(finish_report): fetch the VCC props and send off our REPORT request
(ra_serf_reporter): vtable for new functions
(svn_ra_serf__do_update): init the report and return the reporter vtable

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Minor cleanups.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/serf.c:
(svn_ra_serf__open): Call right register cleanup function.
(expand_ns): Use case-sensitive string compares.
(start_propfind, end_propfind, cdata_propfind): Use strmemdup since we know
we have len chars; use TRUE/FALSE; use case-sensitive compares;
(handle_propfind, fetch_props): use TRUE/FALSE
(svn_ra_serf__check_path): use case-sensitive compares

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Implement reparent, check_path, get_uuid, repos_root.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/serf.c
(serf_session_t): Add char*/apr_uri_t pairs for repos_url and our repos root.
(cleanup_serf_session): Add cleanup function (does not work right yet).
(svn_ra_serf__open): store char* of repos_url; register cleanup.
(end_propfind): Support empty attributes
(fetch_props): Switch to repos_url instead of root_url
(svn_ra_serf__reparent, svn_ra_serf__check_path, svn_ra_serf__get_uuid,
svn_ra_serf__get_repos_root): Implement.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: more work on improving how we parse the XML response.
(The prop cache now entirely avoids the 2nd series of round trips.  Yay.)
* libsvn_ra_serf/serf.c
(ns_t): Change the struct name to ns_t; call the ns value 'url' instead
(propfind_context_t): Add serf_session, make the attr names explicit
(define_ns, expand_ns): Update for field changes
(start_propfind): Don't destroy name arg so end_propfind can work
(end_propfind): if we don't see a CDATA element, put in the tag name for now
minus the namespace tag; update our cache props too.
(cdata_propfind): Update for field changes
(fetch_props): Allow access to the serf session
(svn_ra_serf__get_latest_revnum): abort() if we don't get a version-name.
